markdownRemark.html:
I don’t think my feelings are quite to this extreme, but I definitely sympathize with the tone presented here. Money quote:

The real answer is of course “STOP USING SO MANY ILL-CONCEIVED ABSTRACTIONS AND LEARN FROM YOUR PEERS HOW THE #@$#@% WEB WORKS!”.
